product_name: Mountainsmith Cubik Camera Case - Medium - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Ready for the rigors of adventure, the medium-size Mountainsmith Cubik camera case offers tough protection and handy carrying options for your digital camera. Tough, compression-molded case with YKK zipper, Hypalon reinforcements and soft lining stands up to bumps. Wide opening provides easy access to your camera; two internal stretch-mesh pockets are ideal for storing memory cards and lens cloth. The medium-size Mountainsmith Cubik camera case features a belt loop, carabiner and detachable shoulder strap to make carrying a breeze. Interior measures 5.5 x 3.5 x 2 in. Overstock.
short_description: Ready for the rigors of adventure, the medium-size Mountainsmith Cubik camera case offers tough protection and handy carrying options for your digital camera.
